comments:
I got this exception using  I20070228-0930.

No steps to reproduce. It seems to happen when refreshing the problem view.

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.ui.views.markers.internal.MarkerAdapter.buildAllMarkers(MarkerAdapter.java:251)
at org.eclipse.ui.views.markers.internal.MarkerView.updateForContentsRefresh(MarkerView.java:570)
at org.eclipse.ui.views.markers.internal.MarkerView$MarkerProcessJob.run(MarkerView.java:151)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

This was an initialization issue - we were setting up the resource listeners before there was a widget to show them.

Fixed for build >20070312
Verified by code inspection for I20070320-0010
